section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: Welcome to Bhatia Buzz. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our app.

section2.title: 2. Data We Collect
section2.content: We collect the following types of data:

points.account: Account information (email, display name, profile photo)

points.communication: Communicate with you about your account
points.security: Ensure app security and prevent fraud

section4.title: 4. Data Sharing
section4.content: We do not sell your personal data. We may share your data with:

points.users: Other users (as part of community features)

section5.title: 5. Your Rights (GDPR/CCPA)

points.object: Object to processing of your data

section5.footer: To exercise these rights, contact us or use the settings in the app.

section6.title: 6. Data Security
section6.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data, including: encryption, secure servers, and access controls. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

section7.title: 7. Data Retention
section7.content: We retain your data for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services. When you delete your account, we will delete your data within 30 days, except where we are required to retain it for legal purposes.

section8.title: 8. Children's Privacy
section8.content: Our app is not intended for children under 13 (or 16 in the EU without parental consent). We do not knowingly collect data from children. If you believe we have collected data from a child, please contact us immediately.

section9.title: 9. International Transfers & Data Residency
section9.content: Your data may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your data in accordance with this policy.
section9.dataLocation: Data Storage Location: Your data is stored on Firebase servers located in the United States. We have implemented appropriate safeguards for cross-border data transfers, including standard contractual clauses and technical security measures, to ensure your data is protected in accordance with applicable data protection laws, including UAE Personal Data Protection Law (PDPL) and Qatar Law No. 13 of 2016.

section10.title: 10. Changes to This Policy
section10.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy in the app and updating the "Last Updated" date.

section11.title: 11. Contact Us
section11.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us:

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By accessing or using Bhatia Buzz, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our app.

section2.title: 2. Eligibility
section2.content: You must be at least 13 years old (or 16 in the EU without parental consent) to use this app. By using the app, you represent that you meet the age requirements and have the legal capacity to enter into these terms.

section3.title: 3. Account Registration
section3.content: To use certain features, you must register for an account. You agree to:

points.security: Maintain the security of your account
points.unauthorized: Notify us immediately of any unauthorized access
points.responsible: Be responsible for all activities under your account

points.illegal: Post illegal, harmful, or offensive content
points.harass: Harass, bully, or threaten other users
points.impersonate: Impersonate others or provide false information
points.collect: Collect data about other users without permission

section5.title: 5. Content Ownership
section5.content: You retain ownership of content you post, but by posting, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, display, and distribute your content within the app. You are responsible for ensuring you have the right to post any content you share.

section6.title: 6. Intellectual Property
section6.content: The app and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by Bhatia Buzz and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

section7.title: 7. Privacy
section7.content: Your use of the app is also governed by our Privacy Policy. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your information.

section8.title: 8. Termination
section8.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account at any time for violations of these terms or for any other reason. You may delete your account at any time through the app settings.

section9.title: 9. Disclaimers
section9.content: The app is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee that the app will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free. We are not responsible for the content posted by users or for any interactions between users.

section12.content: We may modify these terms at any time. We will notify you of material changes by posting the updated terms in the app. Continued use of the app after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
